c_help.p: Plays the music, that is it
c_help.pause: Pauses the current song being played
c_help.r: Resumes playing with the discord bot
c_help.s: Skips the current song being played
c_help.q: Displays the current songs in queue
c_help.c: Clears all songs in the queue
c_help.i: Insert the requested song to the queue
